tool_description: A simple API that provides news from the world's leading newspapers or from custom sources
name: Feed On News
title: Feed On News

api_list.name: Get one source by name and section
api_list.description: Shows source by name and section

required_parameters.name: section
required_parameters.description: Source section name according to registration

optional_parameters.name: defaults
optional_parameters.description: Query source. If defaults is true show queries from default sources

api_list.name: Get all sections by source

optional_parameters.name: defaults
optional_parameters.description: Query source. If defaults is true show queries from default sources

api_list.name: Get all sources
api_list.description: Shows all standard or user-customized news sources. Both can be filtered by language

optional_parameters.name: defaults
optional_parameters.description: Query source. If defaults is true show queries from default sources

api_list.name: Get all news
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns all news from sources
**Attention! Make request limitation by specifying sources, sections and search terms for it.  To not receive an invalid result by timeout.**

optional_parameters.name: defaults
optional_parameters.description: Query source. If defaults is true show queries from default sources
